players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob was killed, so he was not mafia. That leaves Charlie and Diana. Let's vote for the one who seems most suspicious."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was killed, so not mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, you didn't mention your investigation, so you might be the mafia."
Diana: remained silent.
You: "Diana, your investigation is solid. Charlie is the mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, you didn't mention your investigation, but maybe you misread. Diana might be lying."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Bob was killed, so he was not mafia. That leaves Charlie and Diana. Let's vote for the one who seems most suspicious."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was killed, so not mafia. Vote Charlie."
You: "Alice, you didn't mention your investigation, so you might be the mafia."
Diana: remained silent.
Alice: "Diana, your investigation is solid. Charlie is the mafia. Vote Charlie."
You: "Alice, you didn't mention your investigation, but maybe you misread. Diana might be lying."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Bob was killed, so he was not mafia. That leaves Charlie and Diana. Let's vote for the one who seems most suspicious."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was killed, so not mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, you didn't mention your investigation, so you might be the mafia."
You: remained silent.
Alice: "Diana, your investigation is solid. Charlie is the mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, you didn't mention your investigation, but maybe you misread. Diana might be lying."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
